                             +    private static final int MAX_PFB_STREAM_LENGTH = 50_000_000;                                                                                  
                             +                                                                                                                                                  
                             +    /**                                                                                                                                           
                             +     * Reads all bytes from the input stream up to a maximum length.                                                                              
                             +     */                                                                                                                                           
                             +    private static byte[] toByteArrayLimited(InputStream in, int maxLen) throws IOException {                                                     
                             +        java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream buffer = new java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream();                                                               
                             +        byte[] tmp = new byte[8192];                                                                                                              
                             +        int totalRead = 0;                                                                                                                        
                             +        int read;                                                                                                                                 
                             +        while ((read = in.read(tmp)) != -1) {                                                                                                     
                             +            totalRead += read;                                                                                                                    
                             +            if (totalRead > maxLen) {                                                                                                             
                             +                throw new IOException("PFB data exceeds maximum allowed length of " + maxLen);                                                    
                             +            }                                                                                                                                     
                             +            buffer.write(tmp, 0, read);                                                                                                           
                             +        }                                                                                                                                         
                             +        return buffer.toByteArray();                                                                                                              
                             +    }                                                                                                                                             
                             +                                                                                                                                                  
                             +    public PfbParser(final InputStream in) throws IOException {                                                                                   
                             +        byte[] pfb = toByteArrayLimited(in, MAX_PFB_STREAM_LENGTH);                                                                               
                                      parsePfb(pfb);                                                                                                                            
                                  }

                             == libFuzzer crashing input ==                                                                                                                     
                             ===Evaluation Report===                                                                                                                            
                             # Evaluation Report                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             ## Summary                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             A Java OutOfMemoryError was triggered during fuzz testing of PDF text extraction. The Jazzer fuzzer reported a                                     
                             `FuzzerSecurityIssueLow` due to heap exhaustion when parsing a PDFs PFB font data. The crash originates in the Apache PDFBox                      
                             library, specifically within the PostScript font parser and downstream font handling components.                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             ## Description                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             - Issue overview                                                                                                                                   
                               During execution of the fuzz harness (`PDFExtractTextFuzzer.fuzzerTestOneInput`), processing a crafted PDF input leads to a                      
                             `java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space`. Jazzer classifies this as a low-severity security issue (resource exhaustion).                      
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             - Vulnerability type                                                                                                                               
                               The problem is a resource exhaustion (denial-of-service) condition caused by unbounded memory usage while parsing or loading                     
                             font data from a PDF.                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             - Key observations                                                                                                                                 
                                The heap overflow occurs in `org.apache.fontbox.pfb.PfbParser.parsePfb`                                                                        
                                The parser is invoked by the `Type1Font.createWithPFB` constructor (fontbox)                                                                   
                                The failure propagates through PDFBoxs `PDType1Font` and `PDFontFactory` layers                                                               
                                PDF rendering and text extraction operators (`SetFontAndSize`, `PDFStreamEngine`, `PDFTextStripper`) are on the call stack                     
                                The fuzzer input triggers excessive memory allocation during font parsing                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             - Components to investigate                                                                                                                        
                               1. **PfbParser** (org.apache.fontbox.pfb.PfbParser)  memory allocation strategy in `parsePfb`                                                   
                               2. **Type1Font** creation with PFB streams (org.apache.fontbox.type1.Type1Font)                                                                  
                               3. **PDType1Font** constructor and font resource caching (org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDType1Font)                                            
                               4. **PDFontFactory** font lookup and instantiation logic (org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDFontFactory)                                          
                               5. **PDF text extraction pipeline** (PDFStreamEngine  LegacyPDFStreamEngine  PDFTextStripper) for any unbounded buffering or                   
                             data structures                                                                                                                                    
                               6. **Fuzz harness entry point** (`PDFExtractTextFuzzer.fuzzerTestOneInput`) to confirm it simply invokes the PDFBox API without                  
                             additional memory constraints                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             This analysis scope will help form a holistic view of how the PFB font data path can exhaust heap memory during PDF processing.                    
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             ## Initial Issue Log                                                                                                                               
                             Here is the initial issue log of the codebase:                                                                                                     
                             <issue>

                             17:package org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font;                                                                                                         
                             18:                                                                                                                                                
                             19:import java.io.IOException;                                                                                                                     
                             20:import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;                                                                                                       
                             21:import java.util.Arrays;                                                                                                                        
                             22:import java.util.List;                                                                                                                          
                             23:                                                                                                                                                
                             24:import org.apache.pdfbox.cos.COSArray;                                                                                                          
                             25:import org.apache.pdfbox.cos.COSBase;                                                                                                           
                             26:import org.apache.pdfbox.cos.COSDictionary;                                                                                                     
                             27:import org.apache.pdfbox.cos.COSName;                                                                                                           
                             28:import org.apache.pdfbox.cos.COSStream;                                                                                                         
                             29:import org.apache.pdfbox.io.RandomAccessRead;                                                                                                   
                             30:import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;                                                                                                         
                             31:import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;                                                                                                     
                             32:import org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.ResourceCache;                                                                                                 
                             33:                                                                                                                                                
                             34:/**                                                                                                                                             
                             35: * Creates the appropriate font subtype based on information in the dictionary.                                                                 
                             36: * @author Ben Litchfield                                                                                                                       
                             37: */                                                                                                                                             
                             38:public final class PDFontFactory                                                                                                                
                             39:{                                                                                                                                               
                             40:    private static final Logger LOG = LogManager.getLogger(PDFontFactory.class);                                                                
                             41:                                                                                                                                                
                             42:    private static final String FONT_TYPE1C = "Type1C";                                                                                         
                             43:    private static final String FONT_OPEN_TYPE = "OTTO";                                                                                        
                             44:    private static final String FONT_TTF_COLLECTION = "ttcf";                                                                                   
                             45:    private static final String FONT_TRUE_TYPE = "true";                                                                                        
                             46:    private static final byte[] TTF_HEADER = new byte[] { 0, 1, 0, 0 };                                                                         
                             47:                                                                                                                                                
                             48:    private PDFontFactory()                                                                                                                     
                             49:    {                                                                                                                                           
                             50:    }                                                                                                                                           
                             51:                                                                                                                                                
                             52:    /**                                                                                                                                         
                             53:     * Creates a new PDFont instance with the appropriate subclass.                                                                             
                             54:     *                                                                                                                                          
                             55:     * @param dictionary a font dictionary                                                                                                      
                             56:     * @return a PDFont instance, based on the SubType entry of the dictionary                                                                  
                             57:     * @throws IOException if something goes wrong                                                                                              
                             58:     */                                                                                                                                         
                             59:    public static PDFont createFont(COSDictionary dictionary) throws IOException                                                                
                             60:    {                                                                                                                                           
                             61:        return createFont(dictionary, null);                                                                                                    
                             62:    }                                                                                                                                           
                             63:                                                                                                                                                
                             64:    private static class FontType                                                                                                               
                             65:    {                                                                                                                                           
                             66:        private static final List<String> cidType0Types //                                                                                      
                             67:                = Arrays.asList(COSName.TYPE1.getName(), FONT_TYPE1C);                                                                          
                             68:        private static final List<String> cidType2Types //                                                                                      
                             69:                = Arrays.asList(COSName.TRUE_TYPE.getName(), COSName.OPEN_TYPE.getName());                                                      
                             70:        private final COSName type;                                                                                                             
                             71:        private final COSName subtype;                                                                                                          
                             72:                                                                                                                                                
                             73:        FontType(COSName type, String subtypeString)                                                                                            
                             74:        {                                                                                                                                       
                             75:            this.type = type;                                                                                                                   
                             76:            if (cidType0Types.contains(subtypeString))                                                                                          
                             77:            {                                                                                                                                   
                             78:                subtype = COSName.CID_FONT_TYPE0;                                                                                               
                             79:            }                                                                                                                                   
                             80:            else if (cidType2Types.contains(subtypeString))                                                                                     
                             81:            {                                                                                                                                   
                             82:                subtype = COSName.CID_FONT_TYPE2;                                                                                               
                             83:            }                                                                                                                                   
                             84:            else                                                                                                                                
                             85:            {                                                                                                                                   
                             86:                subtype = null;                                                                                                                 
                             87:            }                                                                                                                                   
                             88:        }                                                                                                                                       
                             89:                                                                                                                                                
                             90:        FontType(COSName type, COSName subtype)                                                                                                 
                             91:        {                                                                                                                                       
                             92:            this.type = type;                                                                                                                   
                             93:            this.subtype = subtype;                                                                                                             
                             94:        }                                                                                                                                       
                             95:                                                                                                                                                
                             96:        FontType(COSName type)                                                                                                                  
                             97:        {                                                                                                                                       
                             98:            this(type, (COSName) null);                                                                                                         
                             99:        }                                                                                                                                       
                             100:                                                                                                                                               
                             101:        public COSName getSubtype()                                                                                                            
                             102:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             103:            return subtype;                                                                                                                    
                             104:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             105:                                                                                                                                               
                             106:        public boolean isCIDSubtype(COSName cidSubtype)                                                                                        
                             107:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             108:            if (!COSName.TYPE0.equals(type))                                                                                                   
                             109:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             110:                return false;                                                                                                                  
                             111:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             112:            return subtype != null && subtype.equals(cidSubtype);                                                                              
                             113:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             114:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             115:                                                                                                                                               
                             116:    /**                                                                                                                                        
                             117:     * Creates a new PDFont instance with the appropriate subclass.                                                                            
                             118:     *                                                                                                                                         
                             119:     * @param dictionary a font dictionary                                                                                                     
                             120:     * @param resourceCache resource cache, only useful for type 3 fonts, can be null                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/font/PDFontFactory.java:120-180                                                                     
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             120:     * @param resourceCache resource cache, only useful for type 3 fonts, can be null                                                          
                             121:     * @return a PDFont instance, based on the SubType entry of the dictionary                                                                 
                             122:     * @throws IOException if something goes wrong                                                                                             
                             123:     */                                                                                                                                        
                             124:    public static PDFont createFont(COSDictionary dictionary, ResourceCache resourceCache) throws IOException                                  
                             125:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             126:        COSName type = dictionary.getCOSName(COSName.TYPE, COSName.FONT);                                                                      
                             127:        if (!COSName.FONT.equals(type))                                                                                                        
                             128:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             129:            LOG.error("Expected 'Font' dictionary but found '{}'", type.getName());                                                            
                             130:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             131:                                                                                                                                               
                             132:        COSName subType = dictionary.getCOSName(COSName.SUBTYPE);                                                                              
                             133:        if (COSName.TYPE1.equals(subType))                                                                                                     
                             134:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             135:            COSDictionary fd = dictionary.getCOSDictionary(COSName.FONT_DESC);                                                                 
                             136:            if (fd != null && fd.containsKey(COSName.FONT_FILE3))                                                                              
                             137:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             138:                return new PDType1CFont(dictionary);                                                                                           
                             139:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             140:            return new PDType1Font(dictionary);                                                                                                
                             141:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             142:        else if (COSName.MM_TYPE1.equals(subType))                                                                                             
                             143:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             144:            COSDictionary fd = dictionary.getCOSDictionary(COSName.FONT_DESC);                                                                 
                             145:            if (fd != null && fd.containsKey(COSName.FONT_FILE3))                                                                              
                             146:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             147:                return new PDType1CFont(dictionary);                                                                                           
                             148:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             149:            return new PDMMType1Font(dictionary);                                                                                              
                             150:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             151:        else if (COSName.TRUE_TYPE.equals(subType))                                                                                            
                             152:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             153:            return new PDTrueTypeFont(dictionary);                                                                                             
                             154:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             155:        else if (COSName.TYPE3.equals(subType))                                                                                                
                             156:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             157:            return new PDType3Font(dictionary, resourceCache);                                                                                 
                             158:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             159:        else if (COSName.TYPE0.equals(subType))                                                                                                
                             160:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             161:            COSDictionary fontDescriptor = getFontDescriptor(dictionary);                                                                      
                             162:            FontType fontTypeFromFont = getFontTypeFromFont(fontDescriptor, subType);                                                          
                             163:            if (fontTypeFromFont != null)                                                                                                      
                             164:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             165:                COSDictionary descendantFont = getDescendantFont(dictionary);                                                                  
                             166:                COSName descFontType = descendantFont != null                                                                                  
                             167:                        ? descendantFont.getCOSName(COSName.SUBTYPE) : null;                                                                   
                             168:                if (descFontType != null && !fontTypeFromFont.isCIDSubtype(descFontType))                                                      
                             169:                {                                                                                                                              
                             170:                    fixType0Subtype(descendantFont, fontDescriptor, fontTypeFromFont.getSubtype());                                            
                             171:                }                                                                                                                              
                             172:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             173:            return new PDType0Font(dictionary);                                                                                                
                             174:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             175:        else if (COSName.CID_FONT_TYPE0.equals(subType))                                                                                       
                             176:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             177:            throw new IOException("Type 0 descendant font not allowed");                                                                       
                             178:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             179:        else if (COSName.CID_FONT_TYPE2.equals(subType))                                                                                       
                             180:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/PDResources.java:150-220                                                                            
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             150:                return cached;                                                                                                                 
                             151:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             152:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             153:        else if (indirect == null)

                             172:

                             175:            cache.put(indirect, font);                                                                                                         
                             176:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             177:        else if (indirect == null)                                                                                                             
                             178:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             179:            directFontCache.put(name, new SoftReference<>(font));                                                                              
                             180:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             181:        return font;                                                                                                                           
                             182:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             183:                                                                                                                                               
                             184:    /**                                                                                                                                        
                             185:     * Returns the color space resource with the given name, or null if none exists.

                             188:     * @return a new color space.                                                                                                              
                             189:     * @throws IOException if something went wrong.                                                                                            
                             190:     */                                                                                                                                        
                             191:    public PDColorSpace getColorSpace(COSName name) throws IOException                                                                         
                             192:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             193:        return getColorSpace(name, false);                                                                                                     
                             194:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             195:                                                                                                                                               
                             196:    /**                                                                                                                                        
                             197:     * Returns the color space resource with the given name, or null if none exists. This method is                                            
                             198:     * for PDFBox internal use only, others should use {@link #getColorSpace(COSName)}.                                                        
                             199:     *                                                                                                                                         
                             200:     * @param name Name of the color space resource.                                                                                           
                             201:     * @param wasDefault if current color space was used by a default color space. This parameter is                                           
                             202:     * to                                                                                                                                      
                             203:     * @return a new color space.                                                                                                              
                             204:     * @throws IOException if something went wrong.                                                                                            
                             205:     */                                                                                                                                        
                             206:    public PDColorSpace getColorSpace(COSName name, boolean wasDefault) throws IOException                                                     
                             207:    {

                             212:            if (cached != null)                                                                                                                
                             213:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             214:                return cached;                                                                                                                 
                             215:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             216:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             217:                                                                                                                                               
                             218:        // get the instance                                                                                                                    
                             219:        PDColorSpace colorSpace;                                                                                                               
                             220:        COSBase object = get(COSName.COLORSPACE, name);                                                                                        
                             ```

                             <code>

                             128:            throw new IOException("PFB header missing");                                                                                       
                             129:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             130:        // read into segments and keep them                                                                                                    
                             131:        List<Integer> typeList = new ArrayList<>(3);                                                                                           
                             132:        List<byte[]> barrList = new ArrayList<>(3);                                                                                            
                             133:        ByteArrayInputStream in = new ByteArrayInputStream(pfb);                                                                               
                             134:        int total = 0;                                                                                                                         
                             135:        do

                             218:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             219:                        throw new IOException("Font data unavailable");                                                                        
                             220:                    }                                                                                                                          
                             221:                    length1 = repairLength1(bytes, length1);                                                                                   
                             222:                    length2 = repairLength2(bytes, length1, length2);

                             224:                    if ((bytes[0] & 0xff) == PFB_START_MARKER)

                             <code>

                             225:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             226:                        // some bad files embed the entire PFB, see PDFBOX-2607                                                                
                             227:                        t1 = Type1Font.createWithPFB(bytes);                                                                                   
                             228:                    }

                             230:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             231:                        // the PFB embedded as two segments back-to-back

                             63:

                             65:    {                                                                                                                                           
                             66:        private static final List<String> cidType0Types //                                                                                      
                             67:                = Arrays.asList(COSName.TYPE1.getName(), FONT_TYPE1C);                                                                          
                             ```

                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             </code_snippets>                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             ## Fix Strategy                                                                                                                                    
                             <fix_strategy>                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             1. Introduce a sizelimited read helper in fontbox and use it in PfbParser                                                                         
                                a. In org.apache.fontbox.pfb.PfbParser, define a new constant, e.g.                                                                             
                                   `private static final int MAX_PFB_STREAM_LENGTH = 50_000_000;`                                                                               
                                   (or derive it from the existing MAX_LENGTH used in parsePfb).                                                                                
                                b. Replace the unbounded `in.readAllBytes()` in the `PfbParser(InputStream)` constructor with a call to a new helper method,                    
                             e.g.                                                                                                                                               
                                   ```                                                                                                                                          
                                   byte[] pfb = toByteArrayLimited(in, MAX_PFB_STREAM_LENGTH);                                                                                  
                                   parsePfb(pfb);                                                                                                                               
                                   ```                                                                                                                                          
                                c. Implement `toByteArrayLimited(InputStream in, int maxLen)` in PfbParser (or a shared IO utility), which reads chunks into a                  
                             ByteArrayOutputStream, tracks total bytes read, and throws an IOException if the limit is exceeded.                                                
                                d. This change ensures that no array larger than MAX_PFB_STREAM_LENGTH is ever allocated, blocking malicious or malformed PDFs                  
                             from exhausting the heap before parsePfbs boundedsegment logic.                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             2. Streambased PFB parsing in PDType1Font to avoid unbounded `toByteArray()`                                                                      
                                a. In org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDType1Font, locate the call to `byte[] bytes = fontFile.toByteArray();` (around line                      
                             216). Remove or deprecate that direct toByteArray invocation for PFB payloads.                                                                     
                                b. After obtaining the COSStream for the embedded font, inspect the first byte (already done via `bytes[0] & 0xff ==                            
                             PFB_START_MARKER` in existing code). Instead of having read the entire byte array:                                                                 
                                   - Acquire an InputStream from the COSStream, e.g. `InputStream stream = fontFile.createInputStream();`                                       
                                   - Wrap it with the same sizelimiting helper, e.g.                                                                                           
                                     `BoundedInputStream bis = new BoundedInputStream(stream, MAX_PFB_STREAM_LENGTH);`                                                          
                                   - Call `Type1Font.createWithPFB(bis)` directly (there is an overload taking an InputStream).                                                 
                                c. For twosegment fonts (when first byte  PFB_START_MARKER):                                                                                  
                                   - Use the declared `length1` and `length2` values to read precisely those segment lengths, each via the bounded helper:                      
                                     ```                                                                                                                                        
                                     byte[] segment1 = toByteArrayLimited(stream, length1);                                                                                     
                                     byte[] segment2 = toByteArrayLimited(stream, length2);                                                                                     
                                     Type1Font.createWithPFB(segment1, segment2);                                                                                               
                                     ```                                                                                                                                        
                                   - Validate that `length1 + length2` does not exceed MAX_PFB_STREAM_LENGTH to guard against malicious length fields.                          
                                d. If any length checks fail (either POSIX header missing or declared lengths exceed bound), throw an IOException. This ensures                 
                             that PDType1Font never allocates more than MAX_PFB_STREAM_LENGTH bytes in memory.                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             3. Preserve existing caching layers and fontfactory logic                                                                                         
                                - Do not modify PDFontFactory or PDResources. The boundedread enforcement in PfbParser and PDType1Font will automatically cap                  
                             memory usage upstream, so downstream caching and reuse logic remain correct and unchanged.                                                         
                                - The fuzzer harness and existing tests continue to invoke the same APIs; oversized inputs will now fail fast with an                           
                             IOException rather than OOM, which is an acceptable failure mode for malformed or adversarial PDFs.                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             4. Justification and sideeffect mitigation                                                                                                        
                                - By enforcing the same or slightly higher limit at the *initial read* points, we prevent heap exhaustion both in PfbParser and                 
                             in PDType1Font without altering the core parsing algorithm.                                                                                        
                                - Valid PDF files with legitimately large fonts under the threshold continue to parse normally; only files exceeding the                        
                             configurable cap will be rejected.                                                                                                                 
                                - To tune for different use cases, make `MAX_PFB_STREAM_LENGTH` configurable via a system property or via a public API on                       
                             PfbParser.                                                                                                                                         
                                - No external dependencies are introduced; only internal helper methods are added.                                                              
                                - Existing functionalityPFB header validation, segment parsing, text extractionremains unchanged. Only the allocation path is                 
                             hardened.                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             5. Testing                                                                                                                                         
                                - Add unit tests in fontbox for `toByteArrayLimited` to ensure correct behavior at, below, and above the limit.                                 
                                - Add integration tests in pdfbox for PDType1Font parsing of a small PFB font (passes) and an oversized PFB payload (throws                    
                             IOException but not OOM).                                                                                                                          
                                - Verify that existing PDF textextraction tests still pass unmodified.                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             This strategy bounds memory at all unbounded read sites in the PFBfont path, satisfying the fuzzers failure mode (IOException)                   
                             and eliminating the OutOfMemoryError without disrupting existing code paths or tests.                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             </fix_strategy>                                                                                                                                    
                             ===Evaluation End===

                             +    /**                                                                                                                                           
                             +     * Reads all bytes from the input stream up to a maximum length.                                                                              
                             +     */                                                                                                                                           
                             +    public static byte[] toByteArrayLimited(InputStream in, int maxLen) throws IOException {                                                      
                             +        java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream buffer = new java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream();                                                               
                             +        byte[] tmp = new byte[8192];                                                                                                              
                             +        int totalRead = 0;                                                                                                                        
                             +        int read;                                                                                                                                 
                             +        while ((read = in.read(tmp)) != -1) {                                                                                                     
                             +            totalRead += read;                                                                                                                    
                             +            if (totalRead > maxLen) {                                                                                                             
                             +                throw new IOException("PFB data exceeds maximum allowed length of " + maxLen);                                                    
                             +            }                                                                                                                                     
                             +            buffer.write(tmp, 0, read);                                                                                                           
                             +        }                                                                                                                                         
                             +        return buffer.toByteArray();                                                                                                              
                             +    }                                                                                                                                             
                             +                                                                                                                                                  
                             +    public PfbParser(final InputStream in) throws IOException {                                                                                   
                             +        byte[] pfb = toByteArrayLimited(in, MAX_PFB_STREAM_LENGTH);
